conversations.content: Today is November 25th, 2024. I want to rent a car for a day at the Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport. Could you compare the price differences for picking up the car at 9 AM the day after tomorrow and two days after tomorrow at the same place for a 24-hour rental?

functions.name: Search_Car_Rentals
functions.description: Search car rentals. EndPoint: /api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals

pick_up_longitude.description: The pick up location's `longitude`. `pick_up_longitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchDestination`**(Search Car Location)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `longitude` inside `coordinates` object.

drop_off_time.description:
Drop off time
Format: **HH:MM**
*Note: The format of time is 24 hours.* TIME (24-hour HH:MM)

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's `latitude`. `drop_off_latitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchDestination`**(Search Car Location)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `latitude` inside `coordinates` object.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: **HH:MM**
*Note: The format of time is 24 hours.* TIME (24-hour HH:MM)

pick_up_latitude.description: The pick up location's `latitude`. `pick_up_latitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchDestination`**(Search Car Location)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `latitude` inside `coordinates` object.

drop_off_longitude.description: The drop off location's `longitude`. `drop_off_longitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchDestination`**(Search Car Location)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `longitude` inside `coordinates` object.

functions.name: Search_Car_Location
functions.description: Find car rental location by searching for their name, address, city, state, country, etc.. EndPoint: /api/v1/cars/searchDestination

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

functions.name: Get_Availability
functions.description: Check if tickets for tourist attractions are available. EndPoint: /api/v1/attraction/getAvailability

slug.description: `slug` can be retrieved from `api/v1/attraction/searchLocation`**(Search Attraction Location)** endpoint in **Attraction** collection as `productSlug ` inside `products` or `destinations`.

date.description: The availability of the data. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

conversations.content: I'm flying to London for a three-day business trip on November 18, 2024. After my work is done, I'll travel to a nearby city for two days of fun. When the vacation is over, I'll fly back to Berlin directly from there. Could you look up multi-stop flights that fit my needs?

functions.name: Search_Flights_Multi_Stops
functions.description: Search multi-stop Flights. EndPoint: /api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops

adults.description: The **number** of guests who are **18 years** of age or **older**. The **default** value is set to **1**.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
  {
    'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
    'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
    'date': '2024-05-25'
  },
â€¦
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

fromId.description: **From/Departure** airports's location **Id**. `fromId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

toId.description: **To/Arrival** airports's location **Id**. `toId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

children.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are **under 18**.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`children_age: 0,1,17`

functions.name: Search_Taxi
functions.description: Search Taxi. EndPoint: /api/v1/taxi/searchTaxi

drop_off_place_id.description: The drop off location's googlePlaceId. `drop_off_place_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/taxi/searchLocation`**(Taxi Search Location)** endpoint in **Taxi** collection as `googlePlaceId`.

pick_up_place_id.description: The pick up location's googlePlaceId. `pick_up_place_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/taxi/searchLocation`**(Taxi Search Location)** endpoint in **Taxi** collection as `googlePlaceId`.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: **HH:MM**
*Note: The format of time is 24 hours.* TIME (24-hour HH:MM)

query.description: Names of locations, apartment, address, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

functions.name: Get_Availability_Calendar
functions.description: Search the availability calendar for a specific attraction. EndPoint: /api/v1/attraction/getAvailabilityCalendar

id.description: `id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/attraction/searchLocation`**(Search Attraction Location)** endpoint in **Attraction** collection as `productId` inside `products` or `destinations`.

functions.name: Get_Nearby_Cities
functions.description: Search for cities around a given geographical coordinates. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/getNearbyCities

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. `longitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong`**(Location to Lat Long)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. `latitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong`**(Location to Lat Long)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

conversations.content: I am in Italy and interested in opera. Check for opera activities in Rome with available tickets after 9 PM on November 30, 2024. If not, check Taormina for tickets after 9 PM on November 29. I'd like to know the detailed activity information.

products.title: Opera Serenades in Palazzo Doria Pamphilj, Rome

timeSlotOffers.description: Standard: You will be assigned a 2nd row seat.
timeSlotOffers.label: Opera Serenades

timeSlotOffers.description:
Restaurant Il piccolo Vicolo: We chose for your dinner the cozy restaurant Il piccolo Vicolo, very close to Navona Square and Largo Argentina.
Traditional Roman dinner: You will enjoy the best Roman dishes (see the sample Menu). Water and wine (one bottle every two people) are included.
Transportation: Transportation by taxi to the Restaurant after the concert is included.
timeSlotOffers.label: Opera Serenades with dinner
